name: tc-groups-apiserver
description: The new Groups API### Pagination  Requests that return multiple items will be paginated to 20 items by default. You can specify  further pages with the `page` parameter. You can also set a custom page  size up to 100 with the `perPage` parameter.  Pagination response data is included in http headers. By Default, the response header contains links with `next`, `last`, `first`, `prev` resource links.
